* Model: A25-S207
* Website: http://www.toshiba.com

=== Current Issues ===
Sleep does not wake up.
Sleep / Hibernate buttons don't work.
No 3D acceleration (Unsupported ALI chipset messages at boot).
No CPU frequency scaling.
Card reader doesn't work.
